version_description:
CHALLENGES!
This version adds new mode. Simple yet challenging missions with great rewards and fixed loadout.

Other news:
* Enhanced graphics
* New task types (mission 2 for example)
* New weapons
* Tons of bugfixes

CHALLENGES!
This version adds new mode. Simple yet challenging missions with great rewards and fixed loadout.

Other news:
* Enhanced graphics
* New task types (mission 2 for example)
* New weapons
* Tons of bugfixes

• New campaign - Battle of the Bulge, 30 new levels with boss, new flamethrower enemy and exciting story!
• D-Day remade for better performance, visuals and more intensive battle!
• New weapons
• Partial localization

• New campaign - Battle of the Bulge, 30 new levels with boss, new flamethrower enemy and exciting story!
• D-Day remade for better performance, visuals and more intensive battle!
• New weapons
• Partial localization

* Fixed review requests poping up too often
* Smaller fixes and balansing

* Fixed review requests poping up too often
* Smaller fixes and balansing

• NEW multiplayer map
• NEW weapons including MG42, Kar98k with scope or FG42!
• Rebalancing of weapons and armor in favor of armor for better multiplayer battles
• Rebalancing of missions
• Ton of bugfixes

Update contains:
* NEW CHAPTER - Fall of Berlin with 20 new missions
* New cutscenes, unlikely allies and epic bossfight
* Overhaul of many missions
* Localizations for the whole game

Major content and balacing update (2.10) is here!

NEW:
• Challenges for chapter 3 and chapter 4 - 30 new straightforward missions with great rewards
• Enemies - elite and recruit for more variety and better gameplay
